lead_paragraph: THE WORLD ACCORDING TO POWELL Before Sept. 11, he was the lonely hope of European allies, Congressional centrists and the media. What a difference a war makes. A report by Bill Keller in The Times Magazine.
abstract: Preview of Sunday Magazine section, which features article about Sec Colin Powell; photo
